ValidationRule.description: Lock the Type field if the Status is not Draft
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Approved') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Pending Approval(s)') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Canceled') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Complete') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Unsuccessful') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'CAB Approved'), ISCHANGED( Type__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once the status has moved beyond Draft, you can no longer change the Type field
